thread.title: Kyle Lechner
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Kyle Lechner

author: Kyle Lechner
title: Kyle Lechner
text: I've been using Prestige Flowers for a couple years now because I'm in the USA and my wife is in England. I've never had a problem using the service. The website is clean and easy to navigate. The selection is large and the flowers are beautiful. The flowers also last a long time as well. I'll be continuing to use Prestige Flowers even when I move to England and can hand deliver them.
